-- 1. Rejestracja bronze_customers jako tymczasowy widok
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_customers
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/customers/'
);

-- 2. Rejestracja bronze_countries jako tymczasowy widok
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_countries
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/countries/'
);

-- 3. Przygotowanie danych – JOIN + wybór najnowszych po customer_id
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW new_bronze_customers AS
SELECT 
    c.customer_id,
    c.country_id,
    c.company_name,
    c.address,
    c.city,
    co.region_description,
    co.country,
    co.cluster
FROM (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY customer_id ORDER BY update_date DESC) as row_num
    FROM bronze_customers
) c
JOIN bronze_countries co
  ON c.country_id = co.country_id
WHERE c.row_num = 1;

-- 4. Stworzenie tabeli docelowej jako Delta Lake (jeśli nie istnieje)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver_customers
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
AS
SELECT * FROM new_bronze_customers
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- 5. Merge (UPSERT) danych do tabeli docelowej
MERGE INTO silver_customers AS target
USING new_bronze_customers AS source
ON target.customer_id = source.customer_id

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    target.country_id = source.country_id,
    target.company_name = source.company_name,
    target.address = source.address,
    target.city = source.city,
    target.region_description = source.region_description,
    target.country = source.country,
    target.cluster = source.cluster

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    customer_id,
    country_id,
    company_name,
    address,
    city,
    region_description,
    country,
    cluster
  )
  VALUES (
    source.customer_id,
    source.country_id,
    source.company_name,
    source.address,
    source.city,
    source.region_description,
    source.country,
    source.cluster
  );
